statements: DELETE FROM student_reports WHERE student_id = 101 AND progress_score > 80;
DELETE FROM student_reports WHERE engagement_score < 50 AND performance_score < 70;
DELETE FROM StudentPerformance WHERE student_id = 100 AND engagement_level > 5;
DELETE FROM StudentProgress WHERE date < '2022-01-01' AND progress < 50;
DELETE FROM student_engagement WHERE student_id = 100 AND engagement_level = 'High';
DELETE FROM Assignment WHERE course_id = 2 AND assignment_due_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Score WHERE student_id = 101 AND assignment_id = 201;
DELETE FROM Enrollment WHERE student_id = 201 AND enrollment_date < '2022-01-01';
